<Text: Jehovah's Witnesses employ various levels of congregational discipline as formal controls administered by congregation elders.>

Text: Jehovah's Witnesses and congregational discipline:  Members who engage in conduct that is considered inappropriate may be counseled privately by elders and congregational responsibilities may be withheld or restricted.
